title: New insight on how the nose adapts to smells

title_detail.value: New insight on how the nose adapts to smells

summary: Our noses may be able to adapt themselves to tell the brain, as efficiently as possible, about the most typical smells in our environment, suggests new research.

summary_detail.value: Our noses may be able to adapt themselves to tell the brain, as efficiently as possible, about the most typical smells in our environment, suggests new research.
